title: Aone AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter 4.0-serial incl
description:
AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter is a video converter software to convert your videos to VCD, SVCD, DVD formats that can be played on your home VCD/DVD player. 

AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter supports most popular formats such as AVI, DivX, XviD, MPEG4, MPEG1, MPEG2, WMV, ASF. 

Integrated High-speed MPEG encoder that let you make DVD-Video files(VIDEO_TS, AUDIO_TS) and VCD/SVCD image(*.bin,*.cue), so you can burn VCD/SVCD/DVD disc easily by using third-party burning tools. 

Fast conversion speeds and high quality , simple GUI and very EASY to use

Key Functions 
AVI to DVD Converter
You can use AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter to convert AVI DivX Xvid video file to DVD format with Fast conversion speeds because All encoders/codec are built-in 
MPEG to DVD Converter
Convert mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4 video file to dvd format with inside decoder/encoder 
WMV to DVD Converter
AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter is also a wmv to dvd converter software which converts wmv asf video to dvd format 
MPEG Converter
AVI DivX to DVD SVCD VCD Converter is a MPEG Converter can help you convert AVI, DivX, XviD, MPEG, WMV, ASF to VCD,SVCD,DVD compatible MPEG1/MPEG2 format 
Key Features 
Super fast conversion speed provided as it full supports Intel Pentium D Dual-Core Processor and AMD AthlonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ 64 X 2 Dual-Core Processor which ensures full use of your CPU

Convert AVI, DivX, XviD, MPEG, WMV, ASF to VCD SVCD image(*.BIN,*.CUE) and DVD-Video files(*.IFO,*.VOB,*.BUP)
Cut unwanted parts by specifying start time and end time 
Add subtitle onto the output video

High conversion speed and wonderful output quality 
Support "Drag and Drop" from Windows Explorer 
Simple GUI and very EASY to use 
Encoders and decoders are built-in,Any supported conversion can be done once you downloading the software
